document.full_text: the 22-year-old son of a north carolina man who pleaded guilty in february to supporting islamist terrorism pleaded guilty himself on tuesday, justice department officials said.
document.title: south: north carolina: second guilty plea in terror case
lines_and_colors: the 22-year-old son of a north carolina man who pleaded guilty in february to supporting islamist terrorism pleaded guilty himself on tuesday, justice department officials said.
